hammerContent: Use Hammer to remove one block
upContent: Upgrade any block to the current largest number
hinttool2: Drop to upgrade any fruit to the next level
hinttool3: Turn one into a bomb that explodes all the other bombs around it.
hinttool4: Destroy all fruits of a certain type, randomly from fruit 1 to 9, destroy all fruits that come out.
hinttool1: Click any fruit on the screen to break it.
addHeat: Use rescue to add more moves
outOfMove: Use rescue to add more moves
adBreak: Watch a short ad and get reward
tutorial1: Select the middle node to increase the value
tutorial2: Select the middle node to proceed with the value reduction
awesome: You have made a big number!!
blockJustExcludedTT: You have made a big number!!
blockJustExcluded: This block is removed and will not be displayed later.
